response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great asset to you, given its worth of $10,000 to you. Considering its unique features and high quality, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $12,000. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your budget. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
